mapper.sql: id AS "id", user_id AS "userId", number AS "number", gross_amount AS "grossamount", integral AS "integral", health_beans AS "healthBeans", address_id AS "addressId", distribution_mode AS "distributionMode", tracking_no AS "trackingNo", pay_mode AS "payMode", type AS "type", status AS "status", out_time AS "outTime", out_status AS "outStatus", pay_time AS "payTime", refund_reason AS "refundReason", refund_explain AS "refundExplain", is_deleted AS "isDeleted", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sd_order( user_id, number, gross_amount, integral, health_beans, address_id, distribution_mode, tracking_no, pay_mode, type, status, out_time, out_status, pay_time, refund_reason, refund_explain, is_deleted, create_time, update_time )VALUES ( #{userId}, #{number}, #{grossAmount}, #{integral}, #{healthBeans}, #{addressId}, #{distributionMode}, #{trackingNo}, #{payMode}, #{type}, #{status}, #{outTime}, #{outStatus}, #{payTime}, #{refundReason}, #{refundExplain}, #{isDeleted}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sd_order SET user_id = #{userId}, number = #{number}, gross_amount = #{grossAmount}, integral = #{integral}, health_beans = #{healthBeans}, address_id = #{addressId}, distribution_mode = #{distributionMode}, tracking_no = #{trackingNo}, pay_mode = #{payMode}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, out_time = #{outTime}, out_status = #{outStatus}, pay_time = #{payTime}, refund_reason = #{refundReason}, refund_explain = #{refundExplain}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted}, create_time = #{createTime}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE sd_order SET is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE sd_order SET is_deleted = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} WHERE id=#{id}
